title: You May Do as You Like!
detail_text: <:th_ch0009/>Hey, do you understand that Nico is older than you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Of course. I understand that fact pretty well<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Then what is this? This situation! Wh~y are you making sure that I do my homework, Umi!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Maki asked me to, so it can’t be helped<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Haah!? Maki!? At least get Eli to do this!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>It is what it is. Please accept it already<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>I can’t, right now my motivation has gone way down<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Is that so.... Well, then it can’t be helped<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Rare for you to know when to quit. It’s proof that you respect Nico, huh<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>I was told by Maki that when you’re like this, I should let you choose what would you would like to do, Nico<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>What I would like to do....? Club activities, obviously<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Is it homework, the hell triathlon 2 that Kanan made, or the mountain survival training that I made with Emma’s advice? Please choose whatever you like<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>I don’t want to do any of those!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
